SEARCH
Package emissary.util

Class WindowedSeekableByteChannel

java.lang.Object
emissary.util.WindowedSeekableByteChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, ByteChannel, Channel, ReadableByteChannel, SeekableByteChannel, WritableByteChannel
public class WindowedSeekableByteChannel extends Object implements SeekableByteChannel
This class provides a seekable channel for a portion, or window, within the provided ReadableByteChannel. The underlying window size is configured on instantiation. If you intend to move the positions for stateful processing, you should provide a buffer size, buffsize, greater than the maximum amount you wish to operate against at any one time.

This implementation should be able to hold a maximum window of ~4GB. This implementation uses on heap buffers so be wary of using Integer.MAX_VALUE as that can cause and OOME.

      public long getMinPosition()
